entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
